item.description:
Please join us for a Holiday Jerez tasting at the Bakers. Look for the Yellow house with lots of lights.

This holiday gathering will feature a selection of Sherrys and Spanish themed foods

Partial Jerez (Sherry) selection;

Finos;

· Gutierrez Colosia, Fino (dry) Jerez/Xeres/Sherry,

· Tio Pepe, Palomino Fino, Jerez,

Amontillados;

· Pedro Romero, Amontillado (medium)

· Lustau Escuadrilla, Amontillado

Olorosos;

· Williams & Humbert, Dry Sack, Medium Dry,

· El Maestro, Oloroso -15 anos-,

Finish;

· Alvear, Solera 1927 (system started),

o Pedro Ximenez grapes,

Spanish food paring suggestions;

Deborah is planning a Spanish chicken crock pot dish.

Spanish cheeses, olives, spicy meats, Chorizo, seafood, Tapas, dried Mediterranean fruits and nuts are excellent.

Sherrys are not just for before and after meals but are fine with the entrees, particularly the Finos.

Similar to Mexican dishes, with lots of olive oils, garlic, spicy heat, paprika, cumin, potatoes, tomatoes, onions, and omeletes.

And lets not forget the sweets...
item.name: Sherry Tasting
